title: Od pełni do pełni
overview: Buddhist Iwonka falls in love with Oskar, who extorts money from her to help children in Africa, and disappears from her life. Lenka is a fortune teller and has a gift for extracting money from clients. She predicts to Ivona that she will find love in her next incarnation. To achieve fulfillment in her feelings, the woman decides to commit suicide. Despite repeated attempts, she still fails. Oskar's colleague, home-grown inventor Antoś, rushes to her aid. Lenka tries to correct the mistake she made. She wants to make Oskar fall in love with Iwona.
